title: Monarchs

properties.name: description
properties.value: A monarch is a sovereign head of state in a monarchy, such as a kingdom or sovereign city-state. A monarch may exercise the highest authority and power in the state. Gielinor's long history has seen many different rulers with many different titles such as kings, queens, lords, ladies, pharaohs etc. Here is a list of monarchs who are known to have reigned in RuneScape:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Monarchs

A monarch is a sovereign head of state in a monarchy, such as a kingdom or sovereign city-state. A monarch may exercise the highest authority and power in the state. Gielinor's long history has seen many different rulers with many different titles such as kings, queens, lords, ladies, pharaohs etc. Here is a list of monarchs who are known to have reigned in RuneScape:

Name City Kingdom Deceased Time of Reign
King Alvis Keldagrim Dwarven Realm Yes 4th Age
King Arthur Camelot Kandarin (technically Britain) No Present
King Awowogei Marim Ape Atoll No Present
King Baxtorian Baxtorian Falls (Presumably) Tirannwn, West Kandarin No 4th Age
King Bolren Tree Gnome Village Gnome Empire No Present
King Byrne I N/A Great Kourend Yes 4th Age
King Byrne II N/A Great Kourend Yes 4th Age
King Byrne III N/A Great Kourend Yes 4th Age
King Danthalas Unknown Parts of Karamja Yes 3rd Age
Lord Lowerniel Drakan Darkmeyer Morytania No 3rd Age - Present
Queen Efaritay Hallowvale (Now Meiyerditch) Hallowland Unknown 3rd Age
Queen Ellamaria Varrock Misthalin No Present
Emir Al Kharid Kharidian Desert No Present
Fairy Queen Zanaris Zanaris No Present
Fisher King Fisher Realm Fisher Realm No 5th Age
Queen Glarial Baxtorian Falls (Presumably) Tirannwn, West Kandarin Yes 4th Age
King Gjuki Sorvott IV Jatizso Fremennik Isles No Present
King Healthorg Tree Gnome Stronghold Gnome Empire Yes 4th Age
King Jatizso Jatizso Fremennik Isles Yes 5th Age
Lord Kandur Hosidius Hosidius Great Kourend No Present

Mawnis Burowgar Neitiznot Fremennik Isles No Present

King Neitiznot Neitiznot Fremennik Isles Yes 5th Age
The Pharaoh Menaphos Kharidian Desert No Present
King Rada I N/A Great Kourend Yes 4th Age

King Rada III N/A Great Kourend Yes 4th Age
King Raddallin Falador Asgarnia Yes 5th Age
Queen Rashiliyia Unknown Parts of Karamja Yes 3rd Age
King Roald I Varrock Misthalin Yes 5th Age
King Roald II Varrock Misthalin Yes 5th Age
King Roald III Varrock Misthalin No Present
Lady Shauna Piscarilius Port Piscarilius Great Kourend No Present
Lord Shiro Shayzien Shayzien Great Kourend No Present
Queen Sigrid Etceteria Fremennik Province No Present
King Thoros Ardougne Kandarin No 169 5th Age - Present
Lord Trobin Arceuus Arceuus Great Kourend No 4th Age - Present
King Tyras West Ardougne Kandarin Yes 136 5th Age - 169 5th Age

King Vargas Miscellania Fremennik Province No Present
Lady Vulcana Lovakengj Lovakengj Great Kourend No Present
Xeric N/A Great Kourend Unknown 4th Age
Zaros Senntisten Zarosian Empire Unknown 2nd Age

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
A '''monarch''' is a sovereign head of state in a monarchy, such as a [[kingdom]] or sovereign [[city|city-state]]. A monarch may exercise the highest authority and power in the state. [[Gielinor]]'s long history has seen many different rulers with many different titles such as kings, queens, lords, ladies, pharaohs etc. Here is a list of monarchs who are known to have reigned in ''[[RuneScape]]'':
